# MT Makina - Industrial Shredder Manufacturer

> Turkey's leading industrial shredding machine manufacturer since 2003. Exporting to 50+ countries worldwide.

## Company Information
- **Name**: MT Makina
- **Industry**: Industrial Machinery Manufacturing
- **Specialty**: Shredder machines, recycling equipment, waste management systems
- **Location**: Istanbul, Turkey
- **Website**: https://www.parcalamamakinesi.com
- **Languages**: Turkish, English, Russian, Arabic

## Products

### Shredder Machines
- **Single Shaft Shredder (TSH Series)**: TSH-60, TSH-80, TSH-100, TSH-120, TSH-150, TSH-180 - 500-6000 kg/hour capacity
- **Dual Shaft Shredder (CS Series)**: CS-20, CS-40, CS-60, CS-80, CS-100, CS-120, CS-150, CS-180, CS-200 - Industrial grade
- **Quad Shaft Shredder (DS Series)**: DS-80, DS-100, DS-150, DS-200 - Fine shredding with uniform output
- **Metal Shredder (RDM Redmonster)**: RDM-100, RDM-150, RDM-180, RDM-200 - Heavy duty scrap metal processing
- **Mobile Shredder (TSM/CSM Series)**: TSM-150, TSM-300, CSM-150, CSM-200 - On-site portable shredding

### Specialized Equipment
- **Pallet Shredder (TSV Series)**: Wood pallet and wood waste processing
- **Tree Root Shredder (TW Series)**: Forestry waste and root shredding
- **Wood Grinder (TSY Series)**: Biomass and wood chip production
- **Glass Crusher (CK Series)**: Bottle and glass waste crushing
- **Hard Disk Shredder (DATABER)**: Secure data destruction, GDPR compliant
- **Granulator Machines**: Size reduction for recycling
- **Baling Press**: Waste compaction systems
- **Conveyor Systems**: Material handling solutions
- **Separator Machines**: Material sorting equipment

## Applications
- Plastic recycling and processing
- Metal scrap and ELV (End of Life Vehicle) shredding
- Wood waste and biomass processing
- Paper and cardboard recycling
- Tire and rubber recycling
- Electronic waste (e-waste) destruction
- Medical waste processing
- Industrial waste management
- Municipal solid waste processing

## Certifications
- CE Certified
- ISO 9001 Quality Management
- ISO 14001 Environmental Management
